resources.string: Welcome! Guess the name of the logo that appears on the screen. For each correct character guessed, you\'ll get 5 points and for each incorrect guess, you\'ll get -2. Good Luck!

Welcome! Guess the name of the logo that appears on the screen. For each correct character guessed, you\'ll get 5 points and for each incorrect guess, you\'ll get -2. Good Luck! Developed By: JATIN PRUTHI
